title: Limits the period of time in which a defendant against whom a misdemeanor complaint is pending in a local criminal court may be held in custody
summary: Limits the period of time for which a defendant against whom a misdemeanor complaint is pending in a local criminal court may be held in custody by requiring his or her release if a misdemeanor complaint has not been replaced by a misdemeanor information within 120-144 hours of arrest.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to misdemeanor complaints
